column5: Are there other rapids/current areas on the ne section besides/like scaler lake rapids???

You would have to travel further north to where the Wapesi river flows into Wapesi Bay to finds a set of rapids like the one that enters Scaler Lake. Having said that, there is quite a current in Chamberlain Narrows, Kekabeka Narrows, Manitou Rapids and Crooked Rapids that have numerous good fishing spots to try. PjShorthorn.
